articles.title: HDFC Bank launches India's first co-brand hotel credit card with Marriott Bonvoy. Know about the benefits | Mint - Mint
articles.description: HDFC Bank partners with Marriott Bonvoy to launch India's first co-brand hotel credit card, offering travel benefits and rewards.
